title: Musical Statues

sections.heading: HOW TO PLAY
sections.body:
• Record "freeze!" onto one switch and "dance!" onto the other.
• Play some music and start dancing.
• When the switch user presses the "freeze!" switch, pause the music, everyone must stop dancing immediately.
• Only restart the music and begin dancing again when the switch user presses the "dance!" switch.

tooltipText: Use 2 switches to play a game of musical statues, controlling when the music starts and stops
